channel.title: I need a forum hoster for my server
channel.description: If someone can make me an smf forum (not smfforfree) with like visual warning that would be great. Thank you to whoever does this for me.

item.title: I need a forum hoster for my server
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:13, topic:177406”][quote author=guthan software link=topic=238319.msg2024774#msg2024774 date=1201839219]
I am not paying I need a free hoster.
[/quote]
God damnit. I cannot stand people that go on about NEEDING stuff.[/quote]

Me either.

Really though, awardspace, freehostia, nationvoice are 3 free hosters that provide 5-10GB bandwidth/month that are easy to setup.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a forum hoster for my server
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

How come?
One day you ask people to create a smf forum for you, day later you know it a little bit get happy and post a thread ‘making free forums’ lol

Read full topic
item.source: I need a forum hoster for my server

item.title: I need a forum hoster for my server
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Guthan, I’ll install it for you on my webserver, but if I do. I claim all rights to the files hosted on my server. I give you permission to use them. I will have total access to all the files on the server. Other than that I’ll do anything you’d like for forums, website, etc. If you don’t want to go that route, I’ll need some sustenance for what I’m doing. So if you can think of something that might entice me, message me.

Edit: Actually, you might just want to try signing up for http://thatonehosting.info I tried it out, the staff is quite helpfu. And they have a forum system installer, as well as other package installersl. Or you could just go with http://www.webhosting.nationvoice.com/ which they have an smf/phpbb installer aswell. All you have to do is fill in the info. I think ThatOneHosting has a better deal though, you get 2 more mysql dbs than nationvoice.

Edit 2: Did not see you got the problem fixed. Nevermind.

Read full topic

item.description:

guthan software:

What you should be saying is that ‘I WANT free hosting’.

item.title: I need a forum hoster for my server
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:9, topic:177406”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=238319.msg2024795#msg2024795 date=1201839921]
http://bowserjr2.0lx.net/

Register there and you got a free host.

And then make a Mysql database.

And then use auto-script thing.

PS: PM me with your User-name (NOT password) and i can upgrade your account.

And make a another Sub-Domain, that you get when you register sucks.

[/quote]
not to criticise but 0xl.net is a free reseller account, you should buy a reseller account or a vps and start from there. also that auto script thing, make sure you contact 0lx and get them to update it. just a little tip for you.[/quote]
I just use it to test thing, not to earn money.

So no point to use money on it, but if someone want a free Hosting site it can help.

Read full topic
